mapper.insert: INSERT INTO consultation_sessions (user_id, advisor_id, date, start_time, end_time, request_message, sessionId, video_url, status, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{advisorUserId}, #{date}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{requestMessage}, NULL, NULL, 'PENDING', NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM advisor a INNER JOIN users u ON a.advisor_id = u.id WHERE u.id = #{advisorUserId} AND a.is_approved = true)
SELECT advisor_id FROM advisor WHERE advisor_id = #{userId} AND is_approved = 1

SELECT cs.id as reservationId, cs.date as consultationDate, TIME_FORMAT(cs.start_time, '%H:%i') as consultationTime, cs.request_message as requestMessage, u.name as clientName, u.id as clientUserId, cs.status, DATE_FORMAT(cs.created_at, '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%s+09:00') as createdAt FROM consultation_sessions cs INNER JOIN users u ON cs.user_id = u.id WHERE cs.advisor_id = #{advisorId} ORDER BY cs.created_at DESC LIMIT #{pageRequest.limitPlusOne} OFFSET #{pageRequest.offset}

SELECT cs.id as reservationId, cs.date as consultationDate, TIME_FORMAT(cs.start_time, '%H:%i') as consultationTime, cs.request_message as requestMessage, u.name as advisorName, u.id as advisorUserId, a.profile_image_url as profileImageUrl, cs.status, DATE_FORMAT(cs.created_at, '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%s+09:00') as createdAt FROM consultation_sessions cs INNER JOIN advisor a ON cs.advisor_id = a.advisor_id INNER JOIN users u ON cs.advisor_id = u.id WHERE cs.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY cs.created_at DESC LIMIT #{pageRequest.limitPlusOne} OFFSET #{pageRequest.offset}
